attributes.action: change employment laws to prevent RBS and other financial instituations from dismissing employees for being declared bankrupt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some financial institutions such as RBS have a policy of dismissing employees for not managing their personal finances and in the event of an employee being declared bankrupt it is gross misconduct.

How can a bank that is in effect bankrupt due to terrible financial conduct be allowed to enforce such a policy. Banks should have a social responsibility to support their employees through these difficult times. 

Now that most banks are 'owned' by taxpayers, lets bring policies into the new age and adapt to economic climates.
